snippet: Dickinson State University in North Dakota released an audit indicating that exchange students, most from China, received degrees without completing the required coursework.
abstract: Dickinson State University in North Dakota released an audit indicating that exchange students, most from China, received degrees without completing the required coursework.

byline.original: By LILY ALTAVENA and DANIEL E. SLOTNIK

headline.main: Degrees (Without the Work) for Foreign Students at a North Dakota University
